entry.title: Best Paper Nomination at ISMIR 2021
entry.content:
Our publication “Leveraging Hierarchical Structures for Few-Shot Musical Instrument Recognition” has been nominated for best paper at ISMIR 2021. Congratulations to Hugo Flores Garcia, Aldo Aguilar and Ethan Manilow!

Check out the source code on github.
entry.summary: Our publication “Leveraging Hierarchical Structures for Few-Shot Musical Instrument Recognition” has been nominated for best paper at ISMIR 2021. Congratulations to Hugo Flores Garcia, Aldo Aguilar and Ethan Manilow!

entry.title: We host the Oct 27 Bay Innovative Signal Hackers Bash

link.title: We host the Oct 27 Bay Innovative Signal Hackers Bash

entry.content: Please join us for the October 27 virtual BISH Bash meetup, which Bryan Pardo will be hosting, as head of Northwestern University’s Interactive Audio Lab. We will have 4 talks from lab members, followed by Q&A, and some networking over Zoom video conferencing. We hope to see you all there! Click HERE to see the talk abstracts and sign up for this virtual event on Zoom.
entry.summary: Please join us for the October 27 virtual BISH Bash meetup, which Bryan Pardo will be hosting, as head of Northwestern University’s Interactive Audio Lab. We will have 4 talks from lab members, followed by Q&A, and some networking over Zoom video conferencing. We hope to see you all there! Click HERE to see the talk abstracts and sign up for this virtual event on Zoom.

entry.title: Alisa Liu wins student paper award in DCASE 2020

link.title: Alisa Liu wins student paper award in DCASE 2020

entry.content: Alisa Liu’s publication “Model Selection for Deep Audio Source Separation via Clustering Analysis” won best student paper at DCASE2020
entry.summary: Alisa Liu’s publication “Model Selection for Deep Audio Source Separation via Clustering Analysis” won best student paper at DCASE2020

entry.title: Fatemeh Pishdadian defends dissertation
entry.content: Fatemeh Pishdadian defended her thesis “Auditory-inspired Approaches to Audio Representation and Analysis for Machine Hearing “ and will be taking a job at Apple. She will be missed!
entry.summary: Fatemeh Pishdadian defended her thesis “Auditory-inspired Approaches to Audio Representation and Analysis for Machine Hearing “ and will be taking a job at Apple. She will be missed!

entry.title: Pardo on Headroom podcast
entry.content: Lab director Bryan Pardo is featured on episode 7 of Headroom, a podcast dedicated to the impact of audio technology, hosted by Grammy-nominated mastering engineer Jonathan Wyner.
entry.summary: Lab director Bryan Pardo is featured on episode 7 of Headroom, a podcast dedicated to the impact of audio technology, hosted by Grammy-nominated mastering engineer Jonathan Wyner.

entry.title: Invited Talk at AES 2020
entry.content: On September 28, lab director Bryan Pardo will be giving an invited talk at the AES VIRTUAL SYMPOSIUM: APPLICATIONS OF MACHINE LEARNING IN AUDIO
entry.summary: On September 28, lab director Bryan Pardo will be giving an invited talk at the AES VIRTUAL SYMPOSIUM: APPLICATIONS OF MACHINE LEARNING IN AUDIO

entry.title: Lab welcomes 2 new members
entry.content: We’re happy to welcome our two newest lab members: Hugo Flores Garcia and Patrick O’Reilly! Find out more about them on the People page
entry.summary: We’re happy to welcome our two newest lab members: Hugo Flores Garcia and Patrick O’Reilly! Find out more about them on the People page
